segments.text: I notice the girl standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of this whole scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s the lookout or just the eager recipient of the stolen goods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, stretching as far as he can to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they make a good team, even if they’re up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, and they’re taking a huge risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is kind of charming in a chaotic way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at their determination, even if it’s reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so focused on the cookies that they don’t even notice the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR
